data.md:MetaData: Age determination of sediment core UZLOV3X, Lake Uzlovoye, Russia

Lake. Physiography: low land. Surrounding vegetation: cultivated fields and forest. Location: 10 km SW of Kuznechnoye railway station. Notes: high concentration of archaeological sites from Mesolithic up to Early Metal Age
The Baltic Sea and Ladoga Lake transgressions and early human migrations in North-western Russia
